abstract: The retailer wants the state to enforce an Arkansas judge’s order over files the company says a former security technician is holding.
snippet: The retailer wants the state to enforce an Arkansas judge’s order over files the company says a former security technician is holding.
lead_paragraph: HOUSTON — It is hard to escape the long arm of Wal-Mart. Just ask Bruce O. Gabbard, a former computer security technician who was fired by the corporation in March 2007 for spying on company officials.

headline.main: Wal-Mart Security Suit Seeks Oklahoma’s Help
headline.print_headline: Wal-Mart Security Suit Seeks Oklahoma’s Help
